trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation of a channel object that exposes a dictionary interface to its properties.

<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties> is the base class for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties> è la classe base per <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> e <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties> can be used as the base classes for channels and channel sinks that provide named properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> e <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties> può essere utilizzato come le classi di base per i canali e i sink di canale che forniscono proprietà denominate.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties> handles the complex task of asking a channel object for its properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties> gestisce la complessa attività di un oggetto del canale di richiesta delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe esegue una richiesta di collegamento e una richiesta di ereditarietà a livello di classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> viene generata quando il chiamante immediato o la classe derivata non dispone dell'autorizzazione di infrastruttura.

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sui requisiti di sicurezza, vedere [le richieste di collegamento](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) e [richieste di ereditarietà](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: per operare con il codice dell'infrastruttura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties" />, you must override the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Keys" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Item(System.Object)" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando si eredita da <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties" />, è necessario eseguire l'override di <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Keys" /> proprietà e <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Item(System.Object)" /> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties" /> class.
The key that is associated with the object in the <c>value</c> parameter.
The value to add.
Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.

This method must not be implemented because it does not apply to the way <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is being used in this case, and because <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non deve essere implementato perché non si applica alla modalità <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> viene utilizzato in questo caso, poiché <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> restituisce `true`.

trans-unit.source: The method is called.
Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.

This method must not be implemented because it does not apply to the way <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is being used in this case, and because <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non deve essere implementato perché non si applica alla modalità <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> viene utilizzato in questo caso, poiché <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> restituisce `true`.

trans-unit.source: The method is called.
The key of the property to look for.
Returns a value that indicates whether the channel object contains a property that is associated with the specified key.
<see langword="true" /> if the channel object contains a property associated with the specified key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The array to copy the properties to.
The index at which to begin copying.
Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
The method is called.
Gets the number of properties associated with the channel object.
The number of properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di proprietà associato all'oggetto del canale.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator" /> that enumerates over all the properties associated with the channel object.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator" /> that enumerates over all the properties associated with the channel object.
Gets a value that indicates whether the number of properties that can be entered into the channel object is fixed.
<see langword="true" /> if the number of properties that can be entered into the channel object is fixed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il numero di proprietà che possono essere immessi nell'oggetto canale è fissa; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione corrente di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> restituisce sempre `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection of properties in the channel object is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if the collection of properties in the channel object is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se la raccolta di proprietà nell'oggetto canale è di sola lettura. in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsReadOnly%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione corrente di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsReadOnly%2A> restituisce sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the dictionary of channel object properties is synchronized.
<see langword="true" /> if the dictionary of channel object properties is synchronized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il dizionario delle proprietà dell'oggetto canale è sincronizzato. in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsSynchronized%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione corrente di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsSynchronized%2A> restituisce sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: The key of the property to get or set.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the property that is associated with the specified key.
The property that is associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà associata con la chiave specificata.

trans-unit.source: The property is accessed.
It is necessary to implement this property for a derived channel sink to function.
trans-unit.target: È necessario implementare questa proprietà per un sink di canale derivati alla funzione.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of keys that the channel object properties are associated with.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of keys that the channel object properties are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> delle chiavi che sono associate le proprietà dell'oggetto del canale.

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to implement this property for a derived channel sink to function.
trans-unit.target: È necessario implementare questa proprietà per un sink di canale derivati alla funzione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the channel properties associated with the channel object.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the channel properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> delle proprietà del canale associata all'oggetto del canale.

trans-unit.source: Channels properties are used to configure the channel at run time.
trans-unit.target: I canali vengono utilizzate per configurare il canale in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: per operare con il codice dell'infrastruttura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The key of the object to be removed.
Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.

This method must not be implemented because it does not apply to the way <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is being used in this case, and because <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non deve essere implementato perché non si applica alla modalità <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> viene utilizzato in questo caso, poiché <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> restituisce `true`.

trans-unit.source: The method is called.
Gets an object that is used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties" />.
An object that is used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che viene utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso per il <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties" />.

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.SyncRoot%2A> returns a reference to the current instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties>.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione corrente di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.SyncRoot%2A> restituisce un riferimento all'istanza corrente di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that enumerates over all the properties that are associated with the channel object.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that enumerates over all the properties that are associated with the channel object.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of the values of the properties associated with the channel object.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of the values of the properties associated with the channel object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> dei valori di proprietà associate all'oggetto canale.
